attributes.action: Review every drivers driving ability or make every driver re-do their driving test every 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To put a stop to unsafe drivers on the roads, or atleast cut the number, I think that every single driver should have their driving ability reviewed every 5 years or even better, have their driving test re-taken every 5 years.  This petition is for the Prime Minister to make one of the two happen, please show your support.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
